title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:
Product Name: 'UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette'

Product Type: Professional Makeup Painting Kit / Face Body Paint

Suitability: Suitable for both kids and adults

Usage: Ideal for Halloween, FX, parties, artist projects, and more

Palette Contents:
- 20 vibrant colors
- Color types: flash, Aqua
- Specific colors include: gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white

Packaging: Sturdy plastic case for convenience and durability

Application: Easy application with either a sponge or brush

Characteristics:
- Non-toxic and skin-friendly
- Oil-based for easy blending and comfortable wear
- Provides intense, color-saturated coverage
- Quick-drying and smudge-proof
- Durable with minimal rub-off
- Easy to wash off with olive oil or professional waterproof makeup remover

Effects: Achieve a variety of artistic and special effects, perfect for creating unique looks like crowns, costumes, bruises, blood, and cosplay

Occasions: Suitable for festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, campfires, theme parties, stage performances, and Halloween

Discover the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, a versatile and high-quality face and body paint kit perfect for various occasions and creative projects. With 20 vibrant colors that are easy to blend, comfortable to wear, and quick-drying, this oil-based palette offers a durable and smudge-proof solution for your artistic and special effects makeup needs. Packaged in a sturdy plastic case, this palette is perfect for both kids and adults, making it a fantastic addition to your makeup collection for Halloween, parties, and more!
